# Story Bible Templates

Templates for tracking continuity, character states, and established facts during the writing phase.

---

## Master Story Bible Template

```markdown
# Story Bible: [BOOK TITLE]

## Project Status
- **Current Chapter:** [X]
- **Current Scene:** [Y]
- **Total Words Written:** [X,XXX]
- **Last Updated:** [Timestamp]

---

## Chapter Log

### Chapter 1: [Title]
**Word Count:** [X,XXX]
**Completed:** [Date]

**Summary:** [100-200 word summary of what happened]

**Final Character States:**
- [Character]: [Location, emotional state, what they know]
- [Character]: [Location, emotional state, what they know]

**Established Facts:**
- [Fact established this chapter]
- [Fact established this chapter]

**Foreshadowing:**
- Planted: [What was planted]
- Paid Off: [What was resolved]

---

### Chapter 2: [Title]
[Same structure]

---

[Continue for all chapters]
```

---

## Character State Tracker

```markdown
# Character States: [BOOK TITLE]

## [PROTAGONIST NAME]

### Current State (as of Chapter [X])
- **Location:** [Where they are]
- **Physical Condition:** [Health, injuries, exhaustion]
- **Emotional State:** [Current feelings]
- **Fire Status:** [Power level, control, corruption risk]

### Knowledge
What they know (and when learned):
- [Knowledge item] ‚Äî Ch [X]
- [Knowledge item] ‚Äî Ch [X]
- [Knowledge item] ‚Äî Ch [X]

### What They DON'T Know
- [Thing they're unaware of]
- [Thing they're unaware of]

### Relationships
| Character | Current Status | Last Interaction |
|-----------|---------------|------------------|
| [Name] | [Status] | Ch [X] |
| [Name] | [Status] | Ch [X] |

### Inventory/Possessions
- [Item] ‚Äî Acquired Ch [X]
- [Item] ‚Äî Acquired Ch [X]

---

## [CHARACTER 2 NAME]

### Current State (as of Chapter [X])
- **Location:** [Where they are]
- **Physical Condition:** [Health]
- **Emotional State:** [Feelings]

### Knowledge
- [What they know] ‚Äî Ch [X]

### Relationship to Protagonist
**Current:** [Status]
**Trend:** [Improving/Declining/Stable]

---

[Continue for each significant character]
```

---

## Timeline Tracker

```markdown
# Timeline: [BOOK TITLE]

## Story Timeline

| Chapter | In-Story Time | Duration | Key Events |
|---------|--------------|----------|------------|
| 1 | Year 1, Spring, Day 1 | 1 day | [Events] |
| 2 | Year 1, Spring, Day 2 | 1 day | [Events] |
| 3 | Year 1, Spring, Day 2 (continued) | Same day | [Events] |
| 4 | Year 1, Spring, Day 5 | 1 day | [Events] |
| ... | ... | ... | ... |

## Time Gaps
| Between Chapters | Gap | What Happened During |
|-----------------|-----|---------------------|
| Ch 3 ‚Üí Ch 4 | 3 days | [Brief summary of off-page time] |
| Ch 8 ‚Üí Ch 9 | 2 weeks | [Brief summary] |

## Important Dates
- **[Event]:** [When it occurred]
- **[Event]:** [When it occurred]
- **[Deadline]:** [When it must happen]

## Season/Weather Progression
| Chapter | Season | Weather | Notes |
|---------|--------|---------|-------|
| 1-5 | Spring | Mild | |
| 6-10 | Spring | Rainy | Storm approaching |
| ... | ... | ... | ... |
```

## Established Facts Registry

```markdown
# Established Facts: [BOOK TITLE]

## World Rules (Cannot Be Broken)

### Magic System
- [Rule 1] ‚Äî Established Ch [X]
- [Rule 2] ‚Äî Established Ch [X]
- [Rule 3] ‚Äî Established Ch [X]

### Geography
- [Fact about location] ‚Äî Established Ch [X]
- [Fact about distances] ‚Äî Established Ch [X]

### Political/Social
- [Fact about power structure] ‚Äî Established Ch [X]
- [Fact about relationships between groups] ‚Äî Established Ch [X]

### History
- [Historical fact] ‚Äî Established Ch [X]
- [Historical fact] ‚Äî Established Ch [X]

---

## Named Elements

### Characters (All Named)
| Name | Role | First Appearance |
|------|------|-----------------|
| [Name] | Protagonist | Ch 1 |
| [Name] | Companion | Ch 1 |
| [Name] | Antagonist | Ch 3 |
| [Name] | Minor character | Ch 5 |

### Locations (All Named)
| Name | Type | First Mentioned |
|------|------|-----------------|
| [Name] | City | Ch 1 |
| [Name] | Region | Ch 2 |
| [Name] | Building | Ch 4 |

### Organizations/Groups
| Name | Type | First Mentioned |
|------|------|-----------------|
| [Name] | Sect/Order | Ch 2 |
| [Name] | Political faction | Ch 6 |

### Powers/Techniques (All Named)
| Name | Type | First Used |
|------|------|-----------|
| [Name] | Fire ability | Ch 3 |
| [Name] | Cultivation technique | Ch 5 |

---

## Consistency Checks

### Physical Descriptions (Locked)
| Character | Description | Established |
|-----------|-------------|-------------|
| [Name] | [Appearance] | Ch 1 |
| [Name] | [Appearance] | Ch 2 |

### Speech Patterns
| Character | Pattern | Example |
|-----------|---------|---------|
| [Name] | [How they talk] | "[Sample line]" |
| [Name] | [How they talk] | "[Sample line]" |
```

## Foreshadowing Ledger

```markdown
# Foreshadowing Ledger: [BOOK TITLE]

## Planted (Awaiting Payoff)

| Thread | Planted | Chapter | Expected Payoff |
|--------|---------|---------|-----------------|
| [Description] | Ch [X], Scene [Y] | [Summary of plant] | Ch [X] |
| [Description] | Ch [X], Scene [Y] | [Summary of plant] | Ch [X] |
| [Description] | Ch [X], Scene [Y] | [Summary of plant] | Ch [X] |

## Paid Off

| Thread | Planted | Paid Off | Notes |
|--------|---------|----------|-------|
| [Description] | Ch [X] | Ch [Y] | [How resolved] |
| [Description] | Ch [X] | Ch [Y] | [How resolved] |

## Mercy Engine Status

| Mercy | Recipient | Planted | Payoff Status |
|-------|-----------|---------|---------------|
| 1 | [Who] | Ch [X] | ‚òê Awaiting / ‚òë Paid (Ch [Y]) |
| 2 | [Who] | Ch [X] | ‚òê Awaiting / ‚òë Paid (Ch [Y]) |
| 3 | [Who] | Ch [X] | ‚òê Awaiting / ‚òë Paid (Ch [Y]) |
| 4 | [Who] | Ch [X] | ‚òê Awaiting / ‚òë Paid (Ch [Y]) |
```

---

## Invented Details Log

```markdown
# Invented Details: [BOOK TITLE]

## Pending Review

| Detail | Chapter | Context | Status |
|--------|---------|---------|--------|
| [INVENTED: Description] | Ch [X] | [Why invented] | ‚òê Pending |
| [INVENTED: Description] | Ch [X] | [Why invented] | ‚òê Pending |

## Approved (Now Canon)

| Detail | Chapter | Approved |
|--------|---------|----------|
| [Description] | Ch [X] | [Date] |
| [Description] | Ch [X] | [Date] |

## Rejected (Needs Revision)

| Detail | Chapter | Issue | Resolution |
|--------|---------|-------|------------|
| [Description] | Ch [X] | [Problem] | [How fixed] |
```

---

## Style Profile (Persistent)

```markdown
# Style Profile: [AUTHOR NAME]

## Sentence Style
- **Average length:** [X] words
- **Variation:** [Low/Medium/High]
- **Structure mix:** [X]% simple, [X]% compound, [X]% complex
- **Rhythm:** [Description]

## Vocabulary
- **Register:** [Formal/Informal/Mixed]
- **Density:** [Sparse/Moderate/Rich]
- **Signature words:** [List]
- **Words to avoid:** [List]

## Dialogue
- **Attribution style:** [Minimal/Standard/Elaborate]
- **Character distinction:** [How characters differ]
- **Subtext level:** [Light/Moderate/Heavy]

## Description
- **Sensory focus:** [Primary sense]
- **Metaphor density:** [Level]
- **Setting integration:** [Style]

## Interiority
- **POV depth:** [Level]
- **Emotional conveyance:** [Show/Tell balance]
- **Reflection frequency:** [Level]

## Signature Elements
1. [Element 1]
2. [Element 2]
3. [Element 3]

## Calibration Notes
- [Adjustment made after Ch X]
- [Adjustment made after Ch X]
```

---

## Session Log

```markdown
# Session Log: [BOOK TITLE]

## Session [Date/Time]
**Duration:** [X hours]
**Started at:** Chapter [X], Scene [Y]
**Ended at:** Chapter [X], Scene [Y]
**Words written:** [X,XXX]

**Work completed:**
- [Scene/chapter completed]
- [Scene/chapter completed]

**Issues encountered:**
- [Any problems]

**Notes for next session:**
- [What to pick up]
- [Things to remember]

---

## Session [Date/Time]
[Same structure]
```

---

## Word Count Tracker

```markdown
# Word Count: [BOOK TITLE]

## Overall Progress
- **Target:** [X,XXX] words
- **Written:** [X,XXX] words
- **Remaining:** [X,XXX] words
- **Percent Complete:** [X]%

## By Chapter

| Chapter | Target | Actual | Status |
|---------|--------|--------|--------|
| 1 | [X,XXX] | [X,XXX] | ‚úì Complete |
| 2 | [X,XXX] | [X,XXX] | ‚úì Complete |
| 3 | [X,XXX] | [X,XXX] | ‚ü≥ In Progress |
| 4 | [X,XXX] | ‚Äî | ‚òê Not Started |
| ... | ... | ... | ... |

## By Movement

| Movement | Target | Actual | Status |
|----------|--------|--------|--------|
| I | [X,XXX] | [X,XXX] | ‚úì |
| II | [X,XXX] | [X,XXX] | ‚ü≥ |
| III | [X,XXX] | ‚Äî | ‚òê |
| IV | [X,XXX] | ‚Äî | ‚òê |
| V | [X,XXX] | ‚Äî | ‚òê |
| Coda | [X,XXX] | ‚Äî | ‚òê |

## Daily/Session Log

| Date | Words | Cumulative | Notes |
|------|-------|------------|-------|
| [Date] | [X,XXX] | [X,XXX] | Ch 1 |
| [Date] | [X,XXX] | [X,XXX] | Ch 1-2 |
| ... | ... | ... | ... |
```

## JSON Story Bible Structure

For programmatic tracking:

```json
{
  "book_title": "Title",
  "current_chapter": 15,
  "current_scene": 2,
  "total_words": 45230,
  "last_updated": "2025-01-15T14:30:00Z",
  
  "chapters": {
    "1": {
      "title": "The Unlit Forge",
      "word_count": 4523,
      "completed": true,
      "summary": "100-200 word summary...",
      "final_states": {
        "protagonist": {
          "location": "Village",
          "emotional_state": "Restless",
          "knowledge": ["knows about festival", "suspects something wrong"]
        }
      }
    }
  },
  
  "character_states": {
    "protagonist": {
      "current_location": "Mountain pass",
      "physical_condition": "Exhausted, minor wounds",
      "emotional_state": "Determined but grieving",
      "fire_status": {
        "level": "Intermediate",
        "control": "Unstable",
        "corruption": "15%"
      },
      "knowledge": [
        {"fact": "Antagonist's location", "learned": "ch12"},
        {"fact": "True nature of the burden", "learned": "ch8"}
      ],
      "inventory": ["Sword", "Burden artifact", "Mentor's journal"]
    }
  },
  
  "established_facts": [
    {"fact": "Magic requires meditation to recharge", "chapter": 3},
    {"fact": "The capital is three days east", "chapter": 5}
  ],
  
  "foreshadowing": {
    "planted": [
      {
        "thread": "Companion's secret heritage",
        "planted_chapter": 5,
        "planted_scene": 2,
        "expected_payoff": 18
      }
    ],
    "paid_off": [
      {
        "thread": "Mentor's warning about the pass",
        "planted_chapter": 2,
        "paid_chapter": 7
      }
    ]
  },
  
  "mercy_engine": {
    "mercy_1": {
      "recipient": "Enemy scout",
      "planted_chapter": 6,
      "payoff_chapter": null,
      "status": "awaiting"
    }
  },
  
  "timeline": {
    "ch1": "Year 1, Spring, Day 1",
    "ch2": "Year 1, Spring, Day 2"
  },
  
  "invented_details": [
    {
      "detail": "Scout's name 'Wen'",
      "chapter": 6,
      "reviewed": true,
      "approved": true
    },
    {
      "detail": "Color of sect robes",
      "chapter": 8,
      "reviewed": false,
      "approved": null
    }
  ],
  
  "style_profile": {
    "sentence_avg_length": 18,
    "vocabulary_register": "mixed",
    "dialogue_tags": "minimal",
    "signature_elements": [
      "Environment mirrors emotion",
      "Chapters end unresolved"
    ]
  }
}
```

## Continuity Report Template

Generated at manuscript compilation:

```markdown
# Continuity Report: [BOOK TITLE]

## Summary
- **Total Words:** [X,XXX]
- **Chapters:** [X]
- **Potential Issues:** [X]

## Flagged Items

### Character Continuity
| Issue | Chapters | Description | Severity |
|-------|----------|-------------|----------|
| [Issue] | Ch X, Ch Y | [Description] | ‚ö†Ô∏è Medium |

### Timeline Issues
| Issue | Chapters | Description | Severity |
|-------|----------|-------------|----------|
| [Issue] | Ch X | [Description] | üî¥ High |

### Unresolved Foreshadowing
| Thread | Planted | Status |
|--------|---------|--------|
| [Thread] | Ch X | ‚ö†Ô∏è Not paid off |

### Invented Details Pending Review
| Detail | Chapter |
|--------|---------|
| [Detail] | Ch X |

## Verification Checklist
- [ ] All mercy plants have payoffs
- [ ] All Forge Points have three-strand convergence
- [ ] Character states consistent throughout
- [ ] Timeline has no gaps or contradictions
- [ ] All [INVENTED] items reviewed
```
